title: The Accidental Killer Complete Series
description: At eighteen, the future seems set in stone for Christy and her high school sweetheart until their lives are thrown off course by his best friend's older sister. Ricky finds himself the target of Brittany's infatuation as she turns his life upside down by thrusting him into a game with many players all with whom have different motives in play. Games are played. Accidents happen or do they?
author: S.L. Walker
